channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Parked against Bin wall, 4th July
item.description:
Car parked against bin wall for the fourth time in a row where it clearly states no parking against thin wall nothing has been done about it. Please can we have this resolved?.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Sten Close, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Major safety issues at junction of Albert Gate & Knightsbridge, 4th July
item.description:
The area is completely unsafe for both pedestrians and cyclists due to inconsiderate drivers regularly blocking the road and crossings. Every day, cars, trucks, and buses stop across the pedestrian and cycle paths, forcing people to dangerously weave between vehicles just to get through. It's clear many drivers either ignore the road markings or simply don’t care, and it's only a matter of time before someone is seriously injured or worse. This has been a long-standing problem and is now becoming ridiculous. Something urgently needs to be done—either the entire area should be yellow-boxed and properly monitored with enforcement cameras, or the layout needs to be fundamentally changed to prioritise safety. I urge you to take immediate action before a preventable accident occurs.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Knightsbridge, Brompton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: This bush is attracting humans to toilet in, 4th July
item.description:
This bush needs cutting right back. It's not been planted for looks. It's over grown and now the 3rd complaint and nothings been done. We have to live here. It's attracting humans from the park coming to shit in side it. I've also caught 2 people round the back near it also doing drugs. As there's a space between the wall and the bush.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Albany Road, Walworth, London
Report on FixMyStreet
